item.title: React Function Components
item.description: react-function-components Requirements: Create a React application and run it to get default page Remove all extant files Create a new App.js starter file Add a new function component that renders an input field and a button - call this Input Add a new function component that renders a table - call this Table Import and add both new function components as child components to the App
